hajjPackages.title: Premium Hajj Package - 14 Days
hajjPackages.description: Experience a premium Hajj journey with our comprehensive 14-day package. This exclusive package includes premium hotel accommodations near the Haram, comfortable transportation, expert guidance, and all necessary arrangements for a complete and spiritual Hajj pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, VIP transfer to Mecca. Check-in at premium hotel near the Haram and rest after the journey.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Preparation and Umrah
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, visit the Grand Mosque, complete Tawaf and Sai, and spend time in prayer and spiritual preparation for Hajj.

itinerary.title: Journey to Mina
itinerary.description: Travel to Mina on the 8th of Dhul-Hijjah. Set up camp and prepare for the Hajj rituals. Evening prayers and rest.

itinerary.title: Day of Arafat
itinerary.description: Travel to Arafat for the most important day of Hajj. Stand in prayer and supplication from noon until sunset. This is the pinnacle of the Hajj pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Muzdalifah and Mina
itinerary.description: After sunset, proceed to Muzdalifah for prayers and rest. Collect pebbles for the stoning ritual. Return to Mina before dawn.

itinerary.title: Eid al-Adha - Stoning and Sacrifice
itinerary.description: Perform the stoning of Jamarat al-Aqaba, offer sacrifice, shave or trim hair, and perform Tawaf al-Ifadah. Return to Mina for the night.

itinerary.title: Days of Tashreeq
itinerary.description: Continue stoning the three Jamarat on the 11th and 12th of Dhul-Hijjah. Perform prayers and supplications in Mina.

itinerary.title: Return to Mecca
itinerary.description: Return to Mecca, perform final Tawaf al-Wida (Farewell Tawaf), and complete all Hajj rituals. Rest and reflection.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at premium hotel near the Prophet's Mosque. Visit the Prophet's Mosque and offer prayers.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, Quba Mosque, historical sites including Uhud Mountain, and spend time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight with VIP assistance.

inclusions: All ground transportation including VIP transfers
Visa processing assistance with priority service
Camp accommodation in Mina and Arafat
highlights: Premium hotel accommodation near the Grand Mosque
Expert guidance for all Hajj rituals

hajjPackages.title: Deluxe Hajj Package - 21 Days
hajjPackages.description: Experience a deluxe Hajj journey with our extended 21-day package. This comprehensive package offers more time for spiritual reflection, premium accommodations, visits to multiple holy cities, and complete support throughout your Hajj pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, VIP transfer to Mecca. Check-in at deluxe hotel near the Haram with premium amenities.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Extended Preparation
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extended time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, visit historical sites, and engage in deep spiritual preparation for Hajj.

itinerary.title: Visit Jeddah
itinerary.description: Day trip to Jeddah to explore the historic city, visit the Corniche, and experience the Red Sea coastline before Hajj.

itinerary.title: Journey to Mina
itinerary.description: Travel to Mina on the 8th of Dhul-Hijjah. Set up premium camp accommodation and prepare for the Hajj rituals. Evening prayers and spiritual preparation.

itinerary.title: Day of Arafat
itinerary.description: Travel to Arafat for the most important day of Hajj. Stand in prayer and supplication from noon until sunset. Expert guidance and support throughout.

itinerary.title: Muzdalifah and Mina
itinerary.description: After sunset, proceed to Muzdalifah for prayers and rest. Collect pebbles for the stoning ritual. Return to Mina with comfortable transportation.

itinerary.title: Eid al-Adha - Stoning and Sacrifice
itinerary.description: Perform the stoning of Jamarat al-Aqaba, offer sacrifice, shave or trim hair, and perform Tawaf al-Ifadah. Return to Mina for the night.

itinerary.title: Days of Tashreeq
itinerary.description: Continue stoning the three Jamarat on the 11th and 12th of Dhul-Hijjah. Perform prayers and supplications in Mina with extended time for reflection.

itinerary.title: Return to Mecca
itinerary.description: Return to Mecca, perform final Tawaf al-Wida (Farewell Tawaf), and complete all Hajj rituals. Rest and spiritual reflection.

itinerary.title: Extended Stay in Mecca
itinerary.description: Spend extended time in Mecca, perform additional prayers at the Grand Mosque, visit historical sites, and engage in spiritual activities.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at deluxe hotel near the Prophet's Mosque. Visit the Prophet's Mosque and offer prayers.

itinerary.title: Extended Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, Quba Mosque, historical sites including Uhud Mountain, and spend extended time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight with VIP assistance.

inclusions: All ground transportation including luxury vehicles
Visa processing assistance with priority service
Premium camp accommodation in Mina and Arafat
City tours to Jeddah and Riyadh
highlights: Deluxe hotel accommodation near the Grand Mosque

hajjPackages.title: Standard Hajj Package - 30 Days
hajjPackages.description: Experience a comprehensive standard Hajj journey with our 30-day package. This extended package offers ample time for spiritual reflection, comfortable accommodations, and visits to all major holy cities for a complete Hajj pilgrimage experience.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, transfer to Mecca. Check-in at standard hotel near the Haram and rest.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Extended Preparation
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extended time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, visit historical sites, and engage in comprehensive spiritual preparation for Hajj.

itinerary.title: Visit Taif
itinerary.description: Day trip to Taif, the mountain resort city, to enjoy the cooler climate and visit historical sites including the Shubra Palace.

itinerary.title: Visit Jeddah
itinerary.description: Explore Jeddah's historic Al-Balad district, visit the Corniche, and experience the Red Sea coastline.

itinerary.title: Journey to Mina
itinerary.description: Travel to Mina on the 8th of Dhul-Hijjah. Set up camp accommodation and prepare for the Hajj rituals. Evening prayers and rest.

itinerary.title: Day of Arafat
itinerary.description: Travel to Arafat for the most important day of Hajj. Stand in prayer and supplication from noon until sunset. This is the pinnacle of the Hajj pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Muzdalifah and Mina
itinerary.description: After sunset, proceed to Muzdalifah for prayers and rest. Collect pebbles for the stoning ritual. Return to Mina before dawn.

itinerary.title: Eid al-Adha - Stoning and Sacrifice
itinerary.description: Perform the stoning of Jamarat al-Aqaba, offer sacrifice, shave or trim hair, and perform Tawaf al-Ifadah. Return to Mina for the night.

itinerary.title: Days of Tashreeq
itinerary.description: Continue stoning the three Jamarat on the 11th and 12th of Dhul-Hijjah. Perform prayers and supplications in Mina.

itinerary.title: Return to Mecca
itinerary.description: Return to Mecca, perform final Tawaf al-Wida (Farewell Tawaf), and complete all Hajj rituals. Rest and reflection.

itinerary.title: Extended Stay in Mecca
itinerary.description: Spend extended time in Mecca, perform additional prayers at the Grand Mosque, visit historical sites, and engage in spiritual activities.

itinerary.title: Visit Riyadh
itinerary.description: Day trip to Riyadh to explore the capital, visit the National Museum, and experience modern Saudi Arabia.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at standard hotel near the Prophet's Mosque. Visit the Prophet's Mosque and offer prayers.

itinerary.title: Extended Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, Quba Mosque, historical sites including Uhud Mountain, and spend extended time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Return to Jeddah
itinerary.description: Return to Jeddah for final shopping and preparation for departure.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight.

inclusions: All ground transportation including city tours
Camp accommodation in Mina and Arafat
City tours to Taif, Jeddah, and Riyadh
highlights: Standard hotel accommodation near the Grand Mosque
Visits to all major holy cities

hajjPackages.title: Economy Hajj Package - 10 Days
hajjPackages.description: An affordable and efficient 10-day Hajj package, perfect for those with limited time. This budget-friendly option includes all essential services for a complete Hajj experience with comfortable accommodations and expert guidance.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, transfer to Mecca. Check-in at economy hotel near the Haram and brief orientation.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Preparation
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, visit the Grand Mosque, complete Tawaf and Sai, and prepare for Hajj rituals.

itinerary.title: Journey to Mina
itinerary.description: Travel to Mina on the 8th of Dhul-Hijjah. Set up camp and prepare for the Hajj rituals.

itinerary.title: Day of Arafat
itinerary.description: Travel to Arafat for the most important day of Hajj. Stand in prayer and supplication from noon until sunset.

itinerary.title: Muzdalifah and Mina
itinerary.description: After sunset, proceed to Muzdalifah for prayers and rest. Collect pebbles for the stoning ritual. Return to Mina.

itinerary.title: Eid al-Adha - Stoning and Sacrifice
itinerary.description: Perform the stoning of Jamarat al-Aqaba, offer sacrifice, shave or trim hair, and perform Tawaf al-Ifadah. Return to Mina.

itinerary.title: Days of Tashreeq
itinerary.description: Continue stoning the three Jamarat. Perform prayers and supplications in Mina.

itinerary.title: Return to Mecca and Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Return to Mecca, perform final Tawaf al-Wida. Travel to Medina, check-in at hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, offer prayers, and visit key historical sites.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight.

inclusions: Camp accommodation in Mina and Arafat
